Package.Name: cChoco
Package.Description: Chocolatey DSC Resources for use with internal packages and the community package repository. Learn more at http://chocolatey.org/.

Package.Name: PackageManagement
Package.Description: PackageManagement (a.k.a. OneGet) is a new way to discover and install software packages from around the web. It is a manager or multiplexor of existing package managers (also called package providers) that unifies Windows package management with a single Windows PowerShell interface

Package.Name: posh-git
Package.Description: Provides prompt with Git status summary information and tab completion for Git commands, parameters, remotes and branch names.

Package.Name: PowerShellGet
Package.Description: PowerShell module with commands for discovering, installing, updating and publishing the PowerShell artifacts like Modules, DSC Resources, Role Capabilities and Scripts.

Package.Name: powershell-yaml
Package.Description: Powershell module for serializing and deserializing Yaml.

Package.Name: PSPapis
Package.Description: A set of PowerShell scripts which provide integration of Python package Papis.

Package.Name: PSConsoleTheme
Package.Description: PowerShell module to manage Windows console colors and PSReadline token colors.

Package.Name: PSReadLine
Package.Description: Great command line editing in the PowerShell console host

Package.Name: PSScriptAnalyzer
Package.Description: PSScriptAnalyzer provides script analysis and checks for potential code defects in the scripts by applying a group of built-in or customized rules on the scripts being analyzed

Package.Name: VirtualEnvWrapper
Package.Description: A mimic of the VirtualEnvWrapper project but with Powershell

Package.Name: PSEnvironment
Package.Description: Module to make working with environment variables easier.
